select u.handle
     , u.email as email_address
  from email_user u
 where u.status= 'A'
   and u.user_id in
(150498,151743,268851,269788,278342,286907,286911,289824,295413,299180,300621,302053,
309786,344263,344462,7210680,7231913,7278060,7360309,7452777,7467821,7496435,7545675,
8369898,8416548,8430511,8463344,10022398,10098406,10102772,10143068,10169581,10291603,10336829,
10348862,10405908,10407035,10425804,10432128,10447013,10471734,10481599,10526732,
10605450,10651566,11780742,11783349,11783641,11797255,11824548,11843633,11867004,
11889718,11904845,11922119,11968435,12013286,12016481)
and user_id not in (select user_id from user where lower(handle) in ('adic','aubergineanode','mphk',
'gladius','oldbig','xuchuan','dmks','kyky','cucu','aksonov','thecois','wishingbone','adamselene'))
